Name: ViVO
About the game: VIVO is a first person survival and horror game. True survival horror experience:to survive, you will either escape or dominate your emotions. Let light direct you:Only one equipment and one body This game passes through a town where a lot of paranormal events take place at different dates. Everyone who goes to town suffers from memory loss for a reason. Our character, who goes to town for a reason he doesn't know, is looking for ways to get out of the safe. Following the notes left by a girl named Mina, she walks around the lake and tries to leave the area. He witnesses paranormal events full of fear and tension on the way We will see the effort to survive in this town, where there are usually ghost and demons.
